job.title: Data Management - Big Data/Machine Learning Engineer - Sr Big Data/Machine Learning Engineer - Sr
job.description: Big Data/Machine Learning Engineer SrDuration: 8 months Plano, TX (Remote till labor day)Potential Contract to Hire eligible candidatesAbout The Department And TeamData Governance and risk management. From the organizational point of view, we get high-quality trusted data. The vision is to make sure that the data used within data finance should meet the quality standards, we work with different accountable professionals to make sure that we deliver the data as per the pre-defined standards. In case the data is not up to the mark we do root cause analysis and provide those risk analyses to the team.The volume of the work is hugeNot taking the manual approachThe primary role is not to shift these data from one place to another; it would be nice to haveTechnology Required (Must Have)Targeting for 3-5 years of experienced candidates(Not completely a data engineer)Python: Proficient (Programming and scripting so that they know what to do in case there is any loophole or correction is needed)SQL: Must have very strongBI: Grafana or TableauNice to have: AWS (for them to get converted to full time)Data governance and Data management knowledgeSoft SkillsInteract with senior folks; directors and audienceGood Presenting skills to explain the data (Very Important)Someone comfortable to deal with the high Volume work (Very Important)Perform root cause analysis and risk report for COAF datasetsPython, SQL, Tableau
